name: Pandemic Resolution Game
description:
Hi, this is a stimulation game for decision-making using the COVID-19 pandemic as the main setting. It is part of our work for our term paper studying Civil Society and Technological Change in TUM.

Designed and developed by Lui Sing Yi, theoretical framework by Johannes Kleinknecht

Current version: 3.6 Beta

Language: CSS and HTML5

Average Game Play Duration: 10 min

Interface: Click and point

All elements and materials such as photo and music which are not originally developed by us will have a tribute and copyright info on the material itself.
